thread.title: BRIEF-Lemelson Capital Management, Llc Reports 8.4 Pct Stake In Geospace Technologies Corp As Of Feb 8, 2018

title: BRIEF-Lemelson Capital Management, Llc Reports 8.4 Pct Stake In Geospace Technologies Corp As Of Feb 8, 2018

organizations.name: pct stake in geospace technologies corp

text:
April 3, 2018 / 5:32 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Lemelson Capital Management, Llc Reports 8.4 Pct Stake In Geospace Technologies Corp As Of Feb 8, 2018   
April 3 (Reuters) - Geospace Technologies Corp: 
* Lemelson Capital Management, Llc Reports 8.4 Pct Stake In Geospace Technologies Corp As Of Feb 8, 2018 - SEC Filing‍​ 
* Lemelson Capital Management, Llc - CALLED FOR REPLACEMENT OF MANAGEMENT OF GEOSPACE TECHNOLOGIES, EXPLORATION OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES WITH INVESTMENT BANK 
* Lemelson Capital Management, Llc - CALLING FOR IMMEDIATE REMOVAL, FOR CAUSE, OF RICK WHEELER, CEO AND TOM MCENTIRE, CFO OF GEOSPACE TECHNOLOGIES 
* Lemelson Capital Management, Llc - CALLING GEOSPACE TECHNOLOGIES' BOARD TO IMMEDIATELY EXPLORE A SALE OF THE COMPANY Source text - bit.ly/2Ip6HWT Further company coverage:
